average_years_schooling_geo20.long_description: The Education Index measures the average education level achieved by the adult population in an area. This is based on the average years of schooling in an area. Geographies: Census tract (11)
average_years_schooling_geo20.short_description: The Education Index measures the average education level achieved by the adult population in an area. This is based on the average years of schooling in an area. Geographies: Census tract (11)
average_years_schooling_geo20.statement: {value} is the avg yrs of schooling in {features.name}.
